title: Relative Position of a Woman's Height to a Man
question_text: The height of an adult male is approximately normally distributed, with a mean of $69$ inches and a standard deviation of $2.8\text{ inches}$ . The height of an adult female is approximately normally distributed, with a mean of $63.6$ inches and standard deviation $2.5\text{ inches}$ . What would be the approximate height of an adult female with the same standardized score ( $z$ -score) as an adult male with a height of $70.4\text{ inches}$ ?
